sentences.en: Birkin was expressionless , neutralized, possessed by her as if it were his fate, without question.
sentences.cn: 伯金神情麻木地随她拉着手,似乎命运这般安排, 不可反抗似的.

sentences.en: Hand it is good or bad - -- wood expressionless.
sentences.cn: 手上的牌是好是坏 --- 木无表情.

sentences.en: He stepped across and looked at me with expressionless.
sentences.cn: 他来拜访我,面无表情地看着我.

sentences.en: His face had become peculiarly expressionless.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，他的脸已经变得毫无表情。

sentences.en: His face remained expressionless as the verdict was read.
sentences.cn: 在宣读判决书时,他的脸上依然毫无表情.
他的脸上仍然毫无表情.

sentences.en: His face was expressionless, but Alex felt the unspoken criticism.
sentences.cn: 他面无表情，但亚历克斯能感觉到他未明言的批评之意。
他的朗诵几乎毫无感情.

sentences.en: In addition, he also frequently encountered a number of expressionless, enigmatic visages.
sentences.cn: 还有许多毫无表情 、 似笑非笑的脸,也是他在家里常常看见的.
它是呆滞的, 不动的, 无表情的.

sentences.en: She had never seen It'so expressionless before.
sentences.cn: 她以前从没见过他这样毫无表情呢.

sentences.en: She sat expressionless, carefully taking notes.
sentences.cn: 她坐在那儿面无表情，认真记着笔记。

sentences.en: That expressionless face had seemed deep and mysterious.
sentences.cn: 那张毫无表情的脸看上去深沉而又神秘。

sentences.en: The Monsignor gave him a slow, expressionless nod.
sentences.cn: 教士阁下毫无表情地朝他慢慢点了下头。

sentences.en: When Ni's expressionless face in front of an object in a daze.
sentences.cn: 当袮面无表情的对着某个物体发呆.

words.tran_cn: 表现的；有表现力的；表达…的
表现地；意味深长地；表示地
快车，快递，专使；捷运公司
表达，表示；表情；表现力；措辞

trans.tran_en: an expressionless face or voice does not show what someone thinks or feels
